title: 设置领地上限
author: 邪神在世
txt_content:
我是这样配置的，但VIP1这个权限组领地上限还是3

   VIP1: #group name
       # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define.
       #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups.
       #Mirror:
         #- 'group1'
         #- 'group2'
       Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 5
领地上限已经这样设置了，为什么VIP1权限组还是只有3个上限？
MaxResidences: 5

replies.author: ennett01
replies.txt_content: 参数前面加#是几个意思？

replies.author: 邪神在世
replies.txt_content: 加那些东西就不能用是么。。。

replies.author: Peeer
replies.txt_content:
邪神在世 发表于 2016-2-3 20:01
加那些东西就不能用是么。。。
前面加#表示注释
有些是注释要+#，请区分

replies.author: Big-Time
replies.txt_content: 把vip组的权限设置成五个
